site_title: Steve Mutuku — Engineer · Project Manager · Author
bio: I am a civil engineer and project manager who builds systems that deliver. My work blends technical excellence with team leadership—clear plans, tight communication, and accountability. I’m also an author, writing in a voice that is direct, modern, and practical.

projects.title: Kyerwa–Omurushaka Road Upgrade
projects.role: Project leadership, execution planning, stakeholder coordination
projects.impact: Improved regional mobility and safety; streamlined delivery systems

projects.title: Quality & Materials Management
projects.role: QA/QC frameworks for materials testing and documentation
projects.scope: Supervision and compliance aligned to GCC and Employer’s Requirements
projects.impact: Reduced rework, stronger audit trail, faster approvals

projects.title: Process & Team Systems
projects.role: Meeting rhythms, risk registers, mobilization tracking, decision logs
projects.impact: Predictable cadence, clearer decisions, fewer bottlenecks

books.title: Agile Leadership
books.blurb: Becoming the kind of leader people trust and movements follow.

books.title: Leading Projects: The Upstream Advantage
books.blurb: Winning before it starts — strategy, mobilization, and momentum.

books.title: Woman, Thou Art Vindicated
books.blurb: Stories of women who faced prejudice and injustice—and prevailed with courage and faith.
